hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:Once I came riding a she-ass when I had just attained the age of puberty. Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) was offering the prayer at Mina with no wall in front of him and I passed in front of some of the row. There I dismounted and let my she-ass loose to graze and entered the row and nobody objected to me about it

chapter.ara-name: باب سُتْرَةُ الإِمَامِ سُتْرَةُ مَنْ خَلْفَهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Sutra of the Imam is also a Sutra for those who are behind him
